description:
Run AI models locally. One-click install w/ zero configuration.


笳十nBug Fixes & Improvements
笳十nFixed "Fetch failed" error on Mobile Apps and Website
笳十nFixed continue not working on sentences that end in punctuation.
笳十nFix for people, especially in non-US regions, who have had issues sending messages on the chat page
笳十nRefactored model loading & streaming to recover from errors more easily
笳十nUnder the hood improvements to improve stability across Desktop, Mobile, and the Website
笳十nFix for people who are unable to sign in on the Desktop app
笳十nFix for people who are having issues viewing settings pages on the Desktop app
笳十nUnder the hood improvements to prepare for Backyard Parties 汨
